transportAdvice: Malmö has a well-developed public transit network of buses and regional trains that covers tourist areas effectively, and the compact city centre is very walkable and cycle-friendly. Taxis are readily available, and the Øresund Bridge connects the city directly to Copenhagen by train for easy day trips.
